languages.text: "Чудовище на корабле мне ни к чему. Кассия останется здесь, а вы навигируете мой корабль — пока еще живы".

traits.locale_text: "Чудовище на корабле мне ни к чему. Кассия останется здесь, а вы навигируете мой корабль — пока еще живы".

languages.text: "The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."
languages.original_text: "Чудовище на корабле мне ни к чему. Кассия останется здесь, а вы навигируете мой корабль — пока еще живы".

traits.locale_text: "The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."
"The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."
"The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."
"The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."

languages.text: “我一点都不想让怪物上我的船。卡西娅应该留在这里，而你应该趁着你还活着的时候，来我的船上担任导航者。”
languages.original_text: "The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."

traits.locale_text: “我一点都不想让怪物上我的船。卡西娅应该留在这里，而你应该趁着你还活着的时候，来我的船上担任导航者。”

languages.text: «Lo último que necesito es un monstruo en mi nave. Cassia se quedará aquí, y usted servirá como Navegante en mi nave mientras siga con vida».
languages.original_text: "The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."

traits.locale_text: «Lo último que necesito es un monstruo en mi nave. Cassia se quedará aquí, y usted servirá como Navegante en mi nave mientras siga con vida».

languages.text: 「私の船に怪物は必要ない。カシアはここに留まり、お前が生きている間、私の船で航宙士として仕えるのだ」
languages.original_text: "The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."

traits.locale_text: 「私の船に怪物は必要ない。カシアはここに留まり、お前が生きている間、私の船で航宙士として仕えるのだ」

languages.text: "Das Letzte, was ich brauchen kann, ist ein Monster auf meinem Schiff. Cassia bleibt hier, und Ihr werdet auf meinem Schiff als Navigator dienen, so lange Ihr noch lebt."
languages.original_text: "The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."

traits.locale_text: "Das Letzte, was ich brauchen kann, ist ein Monster auf meinem Schiff. Cassia bleibt hier, und Ihr werdet auf meinem Schiff als Navigator dienen, so lange Ihr noch lebt."

languages.text: « La dernière chose dont j'ai besoin, c'est d'un monstre dans mon entourage. Cassia restera ici, et vous vous acquitterez de votre rôle de navigateur à bord de mon vaisseau aussi longtemps que vous vivrez. »
languages.original_text: "The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."

traits.locale_text: « La dernière chose dont j'ai besoin, c'est d'un monstre dans mon entourage. Cassia restera ici, et vous vous acquitterez de votre rôle de navigateur à bord de mon vaisseau aussi longtemps que vous vivrez. »

languages.text: "Gemimde isteyeceğim son şey, bir canavar. Cassia burada kalacak, sen de yaşadığın sürece gemimde Rotacılık görevini yürüteceksin."
languages.original_text: "The last thing I need is a monster on my ship. Cassia shall remain here, and you shall serve as Navigator on my vessel while you still live."

traits.locale_text: "Gemimde isteyeceğim son şey, bir canavar. Cassia burada kalacak, sen de yaşadığın sürece gemimde Rotacılık görevini yürüteceksin."
